name: himig
description: MatteuSan's personal design system for building user interfaces.
author: Matteu <matteugt@gmail.com>

scripts.lit:build: yarn lit:scss && yarn lit:css && yarn lit:ts
scripts.pub:core:patch: cd packages/pintig && npm version patch --force && npm publish
scripts.pub:main:patch: cd packages/himig && npm version patch --force && npm publish
scripts.pub:core:minor: cd packages/pintig && npm version minor --force && npm publish
scripts.pub:main:minor: cd packages/himig && npm version minor --force && npm publish
scripts.pub:core:major: cd packages/pintig && npm version major --force && npm publish
scripts.pub:main:major: cd packages/himig && npm version major --force && npm publish
scripts.pub:patch: npm version patch --force && yarn pub:core:patch && cd ../../.. && yarn pub:main:patch
scripts.pub:minor: npm version minor --force && yarn pub:core:minor && cd ../../.. && yarn pub:main:minor
scripts.pub:major: npm version major --force && yarn pub:core:major && cd ../../.. && yarn pub:main:major
